thread.title: Part-Time City Manager - Austin - Sports and Fitness
thread.title_full: Part-Time City Manager - Austin - Sports and Fitness

title: Part-Time City Manager - Austin - Sports and Fitness
text: Posted/Updated: 10-23-2015 Brief Job Description: This is a perfect fit for someone who is self-directed, passionate about running, knowledgeable about the local food scene, and is able to focus on the little details while still maintaining a large vision for unforgettable events   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
